Hunting for a breakthrough. Since he arrived at Milan from Bodo Glimt, Jens Petter Hauge has played 20 games, scoring 4 goals, but in this 2021 he has seen the field less than he expected. He remained on the bench, without finding minutes, six times, playing three times as a starter, now that the roster has been shortened due to injuries, he is ready to get back into the rotation, to become a protagonist again. The exclusion from the list given to Uefa for the Europa League, has disappointed him, as well as seeing his companions from the bench, but he has never said a word. Never a complaint, he knows that Milan must be earned every day, that he still has a long way to go, that's why he has never failed to work and apply himself in training.

​

CHOICE - Tonight against Udinese, he will not start as a starter, but his entrance in the second half cannot be excluded. At the beginning of 2021 he appeared tired, after having lived a 2020 on the crest of a wave, now he is better physically and is ready to give his contribution. Milan has not changed its opinion on him: he is considered an asset, for the present and the future, that's why in January it said no to Southampton, Bayer Leverkusen and Stuttgart, who wanted him on loan. These months have been useful to understand Italy and Italian soccer, to enter the dynamics of a big club, even when he doesn't play Hauge learns. In order to become a starter for Milan.

篇野話牙豪2020年無休賽期, 而家抖好同埋多幾個月跟操學意大利文, 原來咁多隊想租
